project

Class BasicActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • project.Project
        • project.BasicActions

  • public class BasicActions
extends Project
    Class extends Project class, it includes implementation of buttons and text areas, which are visible in GUI like "LU pivot or "Save".

      • Clear

        public void Clear(javafx.scene.control.TextArea matrixTextArea,
                  javafx.scene.control.TextArea vectorTextArea,
                  javafx.scene.control.TextArea resultTextArea,
                  javafx.scene.control.Label errorLabel)
        Clear all text areas and errorLable.
        Parameters:
        matrixTextArea - text area for inserting matrix.
        vectorTextArea - text area for inserting vector.
        resultTextArea - text area prepared for displaying results of LU factorization and inversion.
        errorLabel - label for displaying errors in GUI

      • DisplayLUResults

                             Matrix A,
                             Vector b,
                             Matrix L,
                             Matrix U,
                             Vector x,
                             double det)
        Display results of LU in Text Area, which is on main scene.
        Parameters:
        matrixTextArea -
        vectorTextArea -
        resultTextArea -
        A - matrix read from text area, original matrix.
        b - matrix read from text area, original vector.
        L - matrix from LU factorization
        U - matrix from LU factorization
        x - computed Vector
        det - double, determinant

        Inv - inverse Matrix
        det - double, determinant.
